name: WP Sessions Time Monitoring Full Automatic
author: SWIT

sections.description:
Plugin will track accurate activity time on specific page, very useful for cases like content reading time, stream or video watching time,
tracking time in LMS online learning system, working time for writing or editing elementor templates, pages editing time, post editing time and similar.

Build as extension of WinterLock functionality for Accurate Sessions Time Tracking

Features:

  • User time spent duration per page
  • Tracking activity time
  • Tracking working time
  • Tracking editing time
  • Tracking writing time
  • Tracking visit time
  • Tracking time on page
  • Tracking reading time
  • Tracking user time
  • Tracking elementor working time
  • Accurate session time tracking
sections.installation:
1. Upload activitytime.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can this work with any theme

Yes plugin is compatible with any theme

Can this wordpress plugin track elementor template editing time

Yes plugin will accurately track elementor template editing time

Will this plugin track time automatically or user need to start / stop tracker

Plugin will track time completely automatically, no actions needed by user/visitor

How plugin affect to performances

You will not notice any performance troubles, plugin using custom tables and basic queries to optimize performance

Where to submit idea, suggestion or question

Inside plugin is contact form or you can ask on support@swit.hr
sections.changelog:
1.0.9

  • Activity time By Post Type
  • Security fix

1.0.8

  • Added page Time By Post Type, with filters by post types and export
  • fix conflict css
  • shortcode [actt_time_page limit=”10″], show activity users for actually page

1.0.7

  • Improvements in filtering, uri now support multiple uris filtering
  • Improvements filtering support on csv export
  • Update libs used and test with latest wp/php
  • PHP 8.2 compatibility fix
  • Loading indicator improvement
  • Bio added in exports

1.0.6

  • Update libs used and test with latest wp/php

1.0.5

  • CSV export improvements, more columns added
  • Update libs used and test with latest wp/php

1.0.3 – 1.0.4

  • Update libs used and test with latest wp

1.0.2

  • Export features per user sessions time and pages timings
  • Statistics Graphs/Tables added for users and pages with auto filtering for sessions and pages
  • Settings feature to access only for specific admin user
  • Settings feature to log only specific user type
  • Settings feature for days logging change (100 by default)
  • Save filters feature
  • Premium Reports/Exports feature added in Addon

1.0.1

  • Close session also on logout, not just after inactivity

1.0

  • Initial version
